name: Skiing Mountain Master
description:
Skiing Mountain Master is a game where you need to control the skiing character to avoid colliding with trees and rocks and touch flags to bet points.
New & Modern Pack, free for a limited time!
EASY TO PICK UP, HARD TO MASTER
* Addictive, intuitive slalom gameplay with sharp, responsive touch controls
* Take close turns like a real olympic athlete… or miss and face-plant !
